text.section:
Subject to the provisions of this section, the Board may waive any examination requirement of this subtitle for an applicant who is licensed in any other state to practice:
Occupational therapy; or
Limited occupational therapy or its equivalent.

The Board may grant a waiver under this section only if the applicant:
Pays the application fee set by the Board under § 10-304 of this subtitle; and
Provides adequate evidence that the applicant:
Meets the qualifications otherwise required by this title; and
Became licensed in the other state after meeting requirements in that or any other state that are at least equivalent to the requirements of this State.
